status.disabled: Sync is not enabled, because your sales channel is disabled.
status.syncingDetail: This could take a few minutes ... This process runs in the background. You can use your store as normal.

log.emptyProductMessage: There are no products in your Sales Channel or Dynamic Product Group.
log.emptyLogMessage: Either no sync has been started or no errors occured.

connection.header: Enter your iZettle credentials and follow the next steps to setup product sync.

customization.subtitle: The domain is needed as download URL for media. It needs to be publicly available.

product-selection.header: Pick a Sales Channel for Product Selection
product-selection.subtitle: You may choose an existing Sales Channel to clone the current selection of products to sync. You can add or remove products of your Sales Channel after the setup wizard.

product-stream.label: Dynamic Product Group
product-stream.subtitle:
You can select a Dynamic Product Group to filter the synchronized products additionally.
If you have not yet created a Dynamic Product Group or do not wish to reduce the number of synchronized products, you can skip this step now or select a group later.

sync.syncPricesSubtitle:
If checked, prices are exported with VAT.
Otherwise product prices will be set to 0 and can be changed in your iZettle product library.
sync.replaceSubtitle: If checked, the existing products in your iZettle product library are removed.

finish.firstParagraph:
Your iZettle account is now linked to your Sales Channel and your products will be transferred to iZettle.
In the future, when you make a sale, we will update your stock in iZettle and Shopware.
finish.secondParagraph: If you need to update your products, we recommend you do this in Shopware and they'll sync to your iZettle app automatically.

authentification.messageTestError: The credentials could not be validated.
authentification.apiKeyDescription:
You need to generate an API key at the iZettle website.
The generated key needs to be pasted here to authorize the connection to iZettle.

swag-paypal-izettle.messageCloneError: Could not clone product visibility from another Sales Channel.
